showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ at. The staff here has been absolutely wonderful. May 14th around noon. They made sure I had a clean shower available immediately. The cashier was absolutely fantastic what a sweetheart. Been driving trucks since 1979. This truck ‚Ä¶
Shower had good pressure  and was hot and they was clean not much for food parking lot is pretty quiet

Came and a lady said it was no shower due to them not being clean and towel not be clean or or dry said I would have to wait 2 hrs but their was no truckers there to dirty the showers in first place been fueling and taking a break for over ‚Ä¶

Shower was perfectly clean with excellent water pressure and temp. The shower porter J.J. really seemed to take pride in his job and was very courteous  when extra towels were needed. Thank you and God Bless.

Tried twice to get a shower. 2nd lady I asked if they were cleaned yet, was rude. Just pure laziness! I, like alot of my fellow company drivers, are not happy that Pilot is our companies fuel supplier now. Pilot sucks and the owner  a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I entered first shower and took out my clothes and then unfortunately checked the water. it was only cold water, i tryed a lot of combinations to catch a little hot water but useless. Only i freezed because I get wet with hope that a mild ‚Ä¶

Didnt have regular gas but super was priced decent.  Friendly staff clean bathrooms and shower rooms . Fully stocked shelfs . And a truck section for LEDs to bluetooth to power inverters.  All and all not bad . Would stop again .

showerReviews.reviewText: Very clean bathrooms and employees were so sweet. Everything was organized and stocked up. ‚Ä¶

Corporate, why are you looking away from this place? Change your management at this location immediately. Things will start looking up. This place is falling apart. Nasty restrooms and half the faucets are brocken. Looks like no one has ‚Ä¶

Usually not one to write reviews, but I was very impressed by the cleanliness of their restrooms and how friendly the workers are. The stalls also offer a lot of privacy which I love as a woman. I was just not expecting to walk in and not have a single complain about smell, cleanliness, or customer service.

Terrence, the GM at this station, was extremely kind and accommodating when my family rolled up with a vomiting toddler today. He and his staff immediately allowed me to use a shower, which was very clean. Sick kids are not usually the ‚Ä¶

There are three gas stations here.  I chose Loves and said to my friends "go there, they always have the cleanest bathrooms." I was 100% wrong. I have never been in a filthier bathroom in my life. There was toilet paper all over the floor, ‚Ä¶
I have family in Va Beach and I live in NC. This Loves is our go between to have lunch and use the restroom. It‚Äôs always friendly people and clean restrooms. Would not go any place else.

Great location. There is limited car/truck/RV parking and handicap accessible spaces. On the menu, McDonald's, Subway are inside, Bojangles is next door. Their streak biscuit and hash rounds are delish! Clean showers and friendly staff. "Be a Beacon of light so others can find their way. Safe and happy travels!" Be'Be'

‚Ä¶ and treats to choose from. They have anything you could probably need for a family road trip or all your truck driving needs, such as a hair cut and a shower or maybe even a new bed and purple pillow! While there get your picture with ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ ! Dirty place, workers are rude and with very bad attitude. I don‚Äôt know why we have to pay 18$ for dirty shower where everything is broken and the worst part but they doing this everywhere, they wipe the floor in a dirty shoes with towels ‚Ä¶

Pretty good truck stop üíØüëç
Sat here for my 34 and it was great. Never waited for a shower, friendly employees, always quiet. Overall good place for a reset. Right across the street from a Love's with McDonald's and the pilot has Subway. ‚Ä¶
Bad service over 1:30 for a shower they üöø won't have water or will be eco-friendly ‚Ä¶

9/3/2020. Stopped here for shower, and coffee, which both were great. Pilot: you need to fix the shower in #4. I turned the lever off as far as I can and as the picture shows, still have a steady stream of water. Subway is not open 24/7, ‚Ä¶

Had a nice shower with good water pressure in shower and sink. 2 lottery machines for your convenience. Hot bar meatloaf, mashed potatoes and broccoli was better than you'd expect. Probably doesn't hurt getting it at 10:30am either. Very ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ night manager.  Poor planning on breaks.  Came in at 5:00 a.m. for a shower,  i'm waiting 2nd in line.  Question the manager and she states the only other person there is on break and will be off in a few minutes.  Waited a bit ‚Ä¶
Putting in new towels without removing the old ones is their idea of a clean shower. Make sure you have shower shoes and don't sit on the toilets.

Shower was excellent twice in a row .

Parking lot was superb!

Pump 25 needs to be respires though .  It overflows while pumping and the on /off lever is broken also .

Friendly staff also !  üëçüëç ‚Ä¶

Maintenance guy called in and showers are closed, but they have 3 cashiers who are there but I guess they don't know how to wash towels or clean a shower. Lazy Pilot employees with the "That's not my job" attitude.
